verbs.description: An old man [V: was] sitting alone in his lodge by the side of a frozen stream .

[ARG1: Nothing] [V: remained] [ARG3: on the place of his lodge - fire but the mis - kodeed , a small white flower with a pink border , which the young visitor , Seegwun , the Spirit of Spring , placed in the wreath upon his brow , as his first trophy in the North] .
